itemDescription: Director of the Prison Reform Trust

wikipedia_page.main: Juliet Lyon CBE is the director of the Prison Reform Trust.She won the Perrie Award in 2014.

response: Stephen Shaw was Director of PRT from 1981 to 1999, when he became the Prisons and Probation Ombudsman for England and Wales. He was succeeded as Director by Juliet Lyon.

|The Shakespeare Trilogy is an outreach scheme by Clean Break Theatre Company, York Saint John University's Prison Partnership Project and the Donmar Warehouse, developed from over four years of workshops in women's jails.  The Lifetime Achievement Award was presented to Juliet Lyon.
* Juliet Lyon, director of Prison Reform Trust
